drupalNodeEvent.title: “China and the War in Ukraine” with Lily Kuo

field_speakers.processed:
Lily Kuo (The Washington Post)

Neysun Mahboubi (University of Pennsylvania)

Victor Shih (University of California, San Diego)

Mary Gallagher (University of Michigan)

Sida Liu (University of Toronto)

Maggie Lewis (Seton Hall University)

Alex Wang (University of California, Los Angeles)

field_description.processed: The Zhengfawei 政法委 Standing Committee will chat with Lily Kuo, the China Bureau Chief for The Washington Post, about developing Chinese perspectives, official and popular, toward Russia's invasion of and the subsequent war in Ukraine.  The conversation will be recorded and available at the event link from the moment it concludes.  Audience participation is welcomed.
